messages.subject: Re: Takenaka Hanbei "Illness"
messages.msgSnippet: ... Tuberculosis is indeed the general consensus among historians.
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "starshine91" <starshine91@...> wrote:
>
> I am reading Taiko, and in it many references are made to Takenaka Hanbei suffering from an "illness." Does anyone know what this illness was? The symptoms are consistent with TB, but I can't find anything that says for certain.
>


Tuberculosis is indeed the general consensus among historians.

messages.subject: Takenaka Hanbei "Illness"
messages.msgSnippet: I am reading Taiko, and in it many references are made to Takenaka Hanbei suffering from an illness.  Does anyone know what this illness was?  The symptoms
messages.messageBody: I am reading Taiko, and in it many references are made to Takenaka Hanbei suffering from an "illness." Does anyone know what this illness was? The symptoms are consistent with TB, but I can't find anything that says for certain.
